underline.text: de hijs par[um] est mathematici siue silogismi
Et ideo tale[m] scie[n]tia[m] de p[ar]alogismis deiscipline no[n] oportet q[uae]rere. [et] si scie[n]tie su[n]t de p[ro]prijs scibilib[us] i[n]finite
tu[m] s[e]c[un]d[u]m p[ro]prias scie[n]tias eru[n]t [et] p[ro]prij elenchi
p[ro]pter q[uo]d illos q[ui] det[er]mi[n]are debe[n]t de p[ro]prijs p[ar]alogismis vniuscuiusq[ue] discipline oportebit omniu[m] p[ro]prior[um] scibiliu[m] esse scie[n]tes
